name: mri_surf2surf
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Resample one surface onto another using FreeSurfer

inputs.description: Name of source subject as found in $SUBJECTS_DIR or ico for icosahedron.
inputs.name: Source Subject

inputs.description: Path of the file with input values.
inputs.name: Source Value File

inputs.description: Use xyz of a surface as input.
inputs.name: Source Value XYZ Surface

inputs.description: Use projected xyz of a surface as input.
inputs.name: Project Frac

inputs.description: Use projected xyz absolute of a surface as input.
inputs.name: Project Absolute

inputs.description: Use tal xyz of a surface as input.
inputs.name: Source Value Tal XYZ Surface

inputs.description: Use vertex area of a surface as input.
inputs.name: Source Value Area Surface

inputs.description: Map annotation file.
inputs.name: Source Value Annot File

inputs.description: Use surface normals of a surface as input.
inputs.name: Source Value NXyZ Surface

inputs.description: Specify source patch file, target surface and number of dilations.
inputs.name: Patch

inputs.description: Source format type string.
inputs.name: Source Format

inputs.description: Apply registration file to sval-xyz.
inputs.name: Register

inputs.description: Apply inverse registration file to sval-xyz.
inputs.name: Inverse Register

inputs.description: Icosahedron order for the source.
inputs.name: Source Ico Order

inputs.description: Name of target subject as found in $SUBJECTS_DIR or ico for icosahedron.
inputs.name: Target Subject

inputs.description: Icosahedron order for the target.
inputs.name: Target Ico Order

inputs.description: Path of the file in which to store output values.
inputs.name: Target Value File

inputs.description: Save target value as a surface file with source xyz.
inputs.name: Target Value XYZ Volume

inputs.description: Target format type string.
inputs.name: Target Format

inputs.description: Save distance from source to target vertices.
inputs.name: Target Distance File

inputs.description: Use the same subject for both source and target.
inputs.name: Single Subject

inputs.description: Hemisphere for both source and target (lh or rh).
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Hemisphere for source (lh or rh).
inputs.name: Source Hemisphere

inputs.description: Hemisphere for target (lh or rh).
inputs.name: Target Hemisphere

inputs.description: Assume source ?h.?h.surfreg file name.
inputs.name: Dual Hemisphere Flag

inputs.description: Turn on jacobian correction, needed when applying to area or volume.
inputs.name: Jacobian Correction Flag

inputs.description: Surface registration for source and target (sphere.reg).
inputs.name: Surface Registration

inputs.description: Source surface registration (sphere.reg).
inputs.name: Source Surface Registration

inputs.description: Target surface registration (sphere.reg).
inputs.name: Target Surface Registration

inputs.description: Method used to map from the vertices in one subject to another (nnfr or nnf).
inputs.name: Mapping Method

inputs.description: Save only nth frame (when using paint output format).
inputs.name: Frame Number

inputs.description: Smooth the source to given FWHM.
inputs.name: FWHM Source

inputs.description: Smooth the target to given FWHM.
inputs.name: FWHM Target

inputs.description: Number of smoothing iterations for input.
inputs.name: Input Smoothing Iterations

inputs.description: Number of smoothing iterations for output.
inputs.name: Output Smoothing Iterations

inputs.description: Use ?h.cortex.label as a smoothing mask.
inputs.name: Cortex Flag

inputs.description: Do NOT use ?h.cortex.label as a smoothing mask (default).
inputs.name: No Cortex Flag

inputs.description: Source smoothing mask.
inputs.name: Label Source

inputs.description: Target smoothing mask.
inputs.name: Label Target

inputs.description: Multiply the input by the given value.
inputs.name: Multiply Input

inputs.description: Divide the input by the given value.
inputs.name: Divide Input

inputs.description: Reshape output to multiple 'slices'.
inputs.name: Reshape Flag

inputs.description: Reshape to Nfactor 'slices'.
inputs.name: Reshape Slices Factor

inputs.description: Reshape fsaverage (ico7) into 42 x 47 x 83.
inputs.name: Reshape 3D Flag

inputs.description: Output each frame separately.
inputs.name: Split Output Flag

inputs.description: Replace input with white Gaussian noise.
inputs.name: Synthesize Input Flag

inputs.description: Replace input with 1s.
inputs.name: Replace with Ones Flag

inputs.description: Rescale so that stddev=1 (good with --synth).
inputs.name: Normalize Variance Flag

inputs.description: Seed for synth (default is auto).
inputs.name: Synthesize Seed

inputs.description: Remove any voxel that is zero in any time point (for smoothing).
inputs.name: Prune Zero Voxels Flag

inputs.description: Do not prune (default).
inputs.name: No Pruning Flag

inputs.description: Project vertices by mag*scale at each vertex.
inputs.name: Project Surface

inputs.description: Project vertices by distmm at each vertex.
inputs.name: Project Norm

inputs.description: Subtract reg2 from --reg (primarily for testing).
inputs.name: Register Difference File

inputs.description: Save RMS of reg1-reg2 (primarily for testing).
inputs.name: RMS File

inputs.description: Compute RMS in mask (primarily for testing).
inputs.name: RMS Mask File

output-files.description: File in which to store output values.
output-files.name: Output Values File

output-files.description: File containing distances from source to target vertices.
output-files.name: Target Distances File
